name: Uzzuzzu My Pet
description:
CRAZY HUMOR

Tary, Boo, Kung, and Ta are not your everyday Pets. They love to play around, even during the most mundane tasks. Watch their crazy antics and get ready for the funniest coloring book in your life.

FAMILY-FRIENDLY

Uzzuzzu My Pet is suitable for all ages and features five different themes of drawings. Let loose on the eight available whiteboards if your imagination needs more stimuli and create something magnificent.


Key features:

- 5 different themes of drawings
- 8 tools with 24 color variations
- Cute design
- Great for all ages
intro: Hop into the lives of four adorable animals. Uzzuzzu My Pet lets you experience a wacky world of absurd scenarios. Relax and sink into the world they inhabit.
